H0.text: Which film is set on the remote Hebridean island of Summerisle. The Beach

H1.text: Which film is set on the remote Hebridean island of Summerisle. The Others

H2.text: Which film is set on the remote Hebridean island of Summerisle. Whisky Galore!

H3.text: Which film is set on the remote Hebridean island of Summerisle. The wickerman

A4.text: The Wicker Man is a 1973 British folk horror film directed by Robin Hardy and starring Edward Woodward, Britt Ekland, Diane Cilento, Ingrid Pitt and Christopher Lee. The screenplay is by Anthony Shaffer, inspired by David Pinner's 1967 novel Ritual, and Paul Giovanni composed the film score. The plot centres on the visit of a police officer, Sergeant Neil Howie, to the fictional, isolated Scottish island of Summerisle in search of a missing girl.
